urls.title: The United States Announces Assistance to the COVID-19
urls.description: STATEMENT BY SECRETARY MICHAEL R. POMPEO This week the State Department has facilitated the transportation of nearly 17.8 tons of donated medical supplies to the Chinese people, including masks, gowns, gauze, respirators, and other vital material s. These donations are a testament to the generosity of the American people. Today, the United States government is announcing it is prepared to spend up to $100 million in existing funds to assist China and other impacted countries, both directly and through

text: @realDonaldTrump Don't take the bait folks.  He wants the news to be about this silly tweet instead of the fact he gave 17.8 TONS of masks, respirators, and med supplies to China on 2/7/20.  https://t.co/7ZufIi02EH
